description: Creation of a professional development plan in collaboration with the workplace supervisor, outlining goals, activities, and key skills to develop during the placement.
Completion of three online modules (one discipline-specific, two professional development) with summative quizzes assessing module content.

item: Work Placement e-portfolio - Part 1: Overcoming Challenges
description: 300-word reflection using the STAR+R template to describe a workplace challenge and how it was resolved.

item: Work Placement e-portfolio - Part 2: Self-Assessment Report
description: 650-word report evaluating progress toward placement goals and the impact of the placement on post-graduation plans.

item: Work Placement e-portfolio - Part 3: Job Application Skills
description: Responses to two job selection criteria (250 words each) based on identified job listings related to placement experience.

item: Work Placement e-portfolio - Part 4: Mock Interview
description: Recorded 7-10 minute mock interview addressing three questions to practice oral communication and interview skills.
Evaluation by the workplace supervisor assessing professionalism, motivation, initiative, and contribution to the workplace.
